mapper.update: update subsurvey set ans1 = #{ans1} +1 where preNum = #{preNum}
update subsurvey set ans2 = #{ans2} +1 where preNum = #{preNum}
update subsurvey set ans3 = #{ans3} +1 where preNum = #{preNum}
update subsurvey set ans4 = #{ans4} +1 where preNum = #{preNum}
mapper.select: select ans1,ans2,ans3,ans4 from subsurvey where preNum = #{preNum}
